duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport steel, equipment, supplies, and machinery throughout the plant and yard in a safe, timely, and efficient manner.
Load and unload trucks, trailers, paint racks, and sandblasting racks.
Band steel to pallets and in bundles using the banding machine.
Operate forklifts in a safe manner and maintain all applicable equipment.
Keep work area organized and clean, adhering to and following all safety rules and PPE requirements.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and two years of experience operating 30,000 lbs. forklifts or bigger.
